author: horwat
msg: <sql:dataSource> accepts the value for the dataSource attribute in the following format:
If there is a space after the ",", then JSTL considers it as a part of the parameter. Ideally all the tokens should be trimmed.

author: horwat
msg: Removed synchronization on getEvaluatorByName() method. Now synchronizing on nameMap and allowing reads to occur without blocking. Should be a performance improvement.
Submitted by Tony Perkins & Richard Kraft
